newsitem.title: COTE D'IVOIRE: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - April 1.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Ivory Coast - April 1.

text.p: These are significant items in the Ivorian press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these items and does not vouch for their accuracy. FRATERNITE MATIN - Ivory Coast signs two offshore gas production contracts, worth $310 million, with U.S.-based United Meridian Corp and Apache International; United Meridian to build butane and propane factory by mid-1998. - Employment minister declares pay strike since March 4 by workers at French-owned Abidjan shipyard CARENA illegal amid signs of a trickle back to work. - Easter traffic accidents leave 16 people dead and 136 injured. LA VOIE - Governnment tax and finance workers union SYNAFISC threatens strike for April 3 and 4 after calling off a two day walkout last week as March pay cheques fell due. LE JOUR - President Henri Konan Bedie releases seven military officers and soldiers jailed 17 months ago for planning a coup but places them under a category of "statutory sanction". -- Abidjan newsroom +225 21 90 90
